Synchronize metadata assay files with remote repository

Source: R/utils.R
sync_metadata_assay_files.Rd

Downloads and caches assay files from a remote repository based on metadata specifications.

Usage

sync_metadata_assay_files(
  data,
  assays = "counts",
  repository = COUNTS_URL,
  cell_aggregation = "",
  grouping_column,
  cache_directory = get_default_cache_dir()
)

Source

Mangiola et al.,2023

Arguments

data

A data frame or tbl_sql containing metadata with required columns cell_id, atlas_id, and a grouping column

assays

Character vector specifying which assays to sync

repository

URL of the remote repository containing the assay files

cell_aggregation

Character string specifying the cell aggregation strategy

grouping_column

Column name in data used to group files for synchronization

cache_directory

Local directory path where files will be cached. Uses default cache if not specified

Value

NULL, invisibly. Progress messages are displayed for the downloads.

On this page

Developed by Stefano Mangiola, Mengyuan Shen, Michael Milton, Silicon Valley Foundation CZF2019-002443, NIH NHGRI 5U24HG004059-18, Victoria Cancer Agency ECRF21036, NHMRC 1116955.
